DOC.brief_summary: This study expand Department Defense ( DoD ) one time , face-to-face post deployment BATTLEMIND training spouse Operation Enduring Freedom/Operation Iraqi Freedom ( OEF/OIF ) Guard/Reserve service member year-long , telephone group focus education , skill build support . The goal build spouse ' resilience cope reintegration , help serve support system return service member , ease transition family post-deployment .
DOC.brief_title: Reintegration : The Role Spouse Telephone BATTLEMIND Pilot Study
DOC.criteria: 1. spouse participate OEF/OIF least 1 month postdeployment ; 2. marry , must live marry least one year ; 3. live service member deploy ; 4. spouse/significant throughout service member 's deployment period ; 5. telephone . 1. current diagnosis schizophrenia major mental illness ; 2. auditory impairment would make telephone use difficult ; 3. service member refusal assent spouse participate .
